nodes.title: Powerful, Configurable, Secure: MetaMask is How You Show Up in Web3
nodes.subtitle: No matter who you are or how you use web3, MetaMask allows you to do more safely on the decentralized internet

image.title: Powerful, Configurable, Secure: MetaMask is How You Show Up in Web3 Image

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Web3 is catalyzing global change and as a MetaMask user, you're leading the charge. You are a trendsetter, trailblazer, creator, and builder, defining and shaping the culture and the systems that will define the next age of the decentralized internet.

Over the years, we’ve built MetaMask to be a wallet without limits, designed for anyone who wants to do more with their crypto, engage with more dapps, and do it more safely. With MetaMask, there are no dead ends, no corner of web3 you can't explore, no dapp you can't connect with. And thanks to its best-in-class security, infinite extensibility, and powerful aggregation and curation in Portfolio, there's never been a better time for you to do more with MetaMask.

Let’s explore further.

MetaMask Makes You More Powerful in Web3

MetaMask is your gateway to the decentralized web, offering unmatched connectivity to thousands of dapps across networks and devices. It enables users to self-custody their assets, securely manage their digital authority and confidently sign transactions on the web, on the go or natively in a dapp.

MetaMask also brings the best of web3 to you. Instead of building “one size fits all” tools, we aggregate the best web3 bridges, DEXs, onramp providers and staking protocols so you can choose the best tool for the job and manage your assets, without ever leaving the wallet.

Users can effortlessly buy, sell, swap, send, trade and stake tokens, knowing they’re getting the best rates from dozens of trusted providers.

Configurability, Privacy, and Extensibility: More Control with MetaMask

MetaMask is also pushing the boundaries of user control, offering unmatched configurability. We didn’t build a “take it or leave it” wallet, instead shaping MetaMask as a customizable extension of you. MetaMask, allows users to set the terms for how applications can interact with their self-custodied data and digital assets.

Nowhere is this configurability more important than with our privacy features that allow users to control even the most basic functionality of the MetaMask wallet - from RPC configuration and token management to custom security warnings and IP tracking. The default settings built into MetaMask to protect users are all configurable, because there is no one size fits all approach to privacy.

Customize your privacy settings:

Extend to any network:

Set your terms:

Configurability is not limited to just what the MetaMask team has built. With MetaMask Snaps, users can tailor their experience, extend MetaMask to new networks and even build their own extensions and customizations, without permission - that's permissionless innovation.

Do Everything in Web3 More Securely with MetaMask

None of this matters if users do not feel secure exploring the frontiers of web3. MetaMask is committed to security and has become the battle-tested wallet trusted by millions of users executing their largest and most sensitive transactions.

We have powered billions of transactions across thousands of networks and scores of dapps, without security incidents caused by MetaMask and offer support to our customers 24/7 to ensure they safely navigate web3.

We are constantly investing in security, striking new partnerships like Blockaid's transaction security, adding new capabilities through the team at Wallet Guard, enabling users to build a modular wallet through Snaps and even building runtime protection through our Lavamoat security kernel. And with an open-source codebase and a transparent approach to privacy, you know exactly what you’re using with MetaMask.

MetaMask, an Extension of You in Web3 Now and Always

As the momentum of regulatory clarity and mainstream interest spurs innovation in our space, MetaMask will continue to be the powerful, configurable, secure wallet for those building and exploring the frontiers of the decentralized internet.

With powerful aggregators that put the best of tools in crypto at your fingertips and configurable settings that put you in control of your assets, data and digital authority, and a steadfast commitment to security and privacy preservation - MetaMask enables you to do more, safely, in web3.

And we’re just getting started.

This post is directed only at persons outside the UK and should not be acted on by UK consumers.

nodes.metaDescription: Powerful, Configurable, Secure: MetaMask is How You Show Up in Web3

nodes.title: Introducing estimated balance changes for clear transaction outcomes
nodes.subtitle: With estimated balance changes, MetaMask users will get better insight into their send and receive amounts after submitting transactions.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Our latest update introduces estimated balance changes to make it easier to understand what you’re about to sign.

Estimated balance changes act as a simulation displayed on the confirmation screen to provide a clear overview of the token values of the transaction you're about to confirm. Following the recent integration of Blockaid security alerts, this feature is part of our ongoing commitment to enhance both the user experience and security for our community.

The feature is on by default in MetaMask Extension and Mobile, enjoy!

Multi-network balance updates


Estimated changes are now available for a wide range of token and NFT transactions across:

  • Ethereum mainnet
  • Arbitrum
  • Avalanche
  • Base
  • Linea
  • OP Mainnet
  • Polygon

Our goal with this update is to present a confirmation screen that is both clear and informative, making it easier for you to understand exactly the transaction you’re about to confirm.

What you can expect to see in your MetaMask wallet


Previously, MetaMask provided details on transaction fees and the total transaction value but lacked a straightforward way to visualize the specific value changes resulting from a transaction. With this update, you'll see precise estimations of the tokens and values being transferred, enhancing your visibility into the movement of assets in and out of your wallet.


Example of the confirmation screen before and after the introduction of estimated balance changes.

Transaction clarity and user safety


Estimated balance changes prevent unintended transaction outcomes that could happen by accident or malicious activity while promoting confidence and safety when exploring web3. It allows you to confirm the amount of tokens from your transaction, separate from your gas fees, before clicking Confirm. For example, estimated balance changes might help in situations where you're thinking you're minting a NFT but may confirm that you're sending money out but not getting anything in return.

We hope our new estimated balance updates help you more safely and clearly navigate through the exciting opportunities within web3!

nodes.metaDescription: With estimated balance changes, MetaMask users will get better insight into their send and receive amounts after submitting transactions.

nodes.title: MetaMask UI Update: Token Auto-Detection Now Available by Default on Extension
nodes.subtitle: Token auto-detection is now enabled by default for new users on MetaMask Extension.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Token auto-detection automatically suggests tokens on the selected network for every network that Portfolio currently supports, eliminating the need for manual token imports.

🔍 For New Users: Whether it’s your first wallet or you are importing a new account, this feature is enabled by default so you will automatically be able to view all your assets.

❗ For Existing Users: Enable this feature if you’re an existing MetaMask Extension user in your Security and Privacy settings under Token Autodetection. To make it easy for existing users to turn this on, they will see a modal asking to turn this feature on.

👉 Turning Off the Feature: You can disable this feature anytime in your Security and Privacy settings under Token Autodetection.

You can read more about token auto-detection in our support article.

Begone, manual token imports. Enjoy!

nodes.metaTitle: Token Auto-Detection Now Available by Default on MetaMask
nodes.metaDescription: Token auto-detection is now enabled by default for new users on MetaMask Extension.

nodes.title: MetaMask UX Update: Fiat Value Toggle in Testnets for Mobile Users
nodes.subtitle: The new update introduces a toggle for fiat values on testnets enhancing awareness and preventing scams.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Showing fiat values in testnets is now a toggle option available on MetaMask Mobile to prevent scammers from exploiting testnet values and to give developers greater control over their MetaMask experience.

This feature is off by default and can be turned back on in settings to show fiat value again.

 

🌐 For Users: This helps bring more awareness of testnets as a potential scam vector. Scammers often use testnet values to build "trust" by sending users valueless testnet ETH that appears to have fiat value, then later asking for real funds in return.

⚒️ For Developers: As a developer, you now have the same control over your testnet experience on MetaMask Mobile as you do on Extension. This toggle allows developers to enable or disable fiat values for testnets as needed. Note: This has been turned off by default for the safety of the majority of users and can be turned back on in settings.

Stay tuned for more MetaMask UX updates. Enjoy!

nodes.metaTitle: Fiat Value Toggle in Testnets for Mobile Users
nodes.metaDescription: The new update introduces a toggle for fiat values on testnets enhancing awareness and preventing scams.
